name: Portal 2 Map Launcher

screenshots.caption: The Portal 2 Map Launcher by Digaly

short_description:
With this simple tool, you can launch your Portal 2 maps instantly without having to start Portal 2, enabling the console, typing "map mapname" & hitting enter. All you have to do is specify where your Portal 2 standalone .exe is located, then, after your map is installed properly, you can enter its name without the extension into the second textbox. Finally you can enable the console or specify extra parameters yourself. Then just hit the awesome launch button & enjoy the map!

An extra feature is that all the default maps are listed. Just start typing a default map name like "sp" or "mp" and it will suggest any of the default mapnames. 

- Digaly
summary: Portal 2 Map Launcher helps launching your Portal 2 maps fast & easy.
